title: Cape Town versus Johannesburg
text:
Cape Town versus Johannesburg Fri, 09 Oct 2015 4:57 PM Share Table Mountain in Cape Town. Credit: flickr.com/ Juan Alberto Garcia Rivera 
Johannesburg or Cape Town? Which is better? That seems to be an argument that will continue in perpetuity. But we have some hard facts about each city. 
Cheapflights has created a great infographic which compares each city in terms of size, population and other aspects. 
No, the infographic doesn't decide which city is better - that's for you to decide. 
But it does give you quite an overview of what each city has on offer. 
Check out the infographic below: Related Articles
